alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff and northwestern Morrill Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 722 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, or 22 miles southwest of Alliance, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Northport, Angora and The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
